titleStmt.title: A bryefe summe of the whole Byble. A Chrystian instruction for al parsons yonge and olde, to the whiche is annexed the ordenarye for all degrees. / Translated out of Doutche into Inglysh by Antony Scoloker.
titleStmt.author: Heyden, Cornelius van der.
Scoloker, Anthony, fl. 1548.

publicationStmt.publisher: by Robert Stoughton Dwellynge wythin Ludgate at the s[i]ngne [sic] of the Byshoppis Myter.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Cornelius van der Heyden in STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Imperfect: stained, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the s[i]ngne [sic] of the Byshoppis Myter.
